commandsListTooltip:
Denna bot skapades för Hypixel Translators Community av %%developer%%. Den öppna källkoden och vårt GitHub-arkiv finner du [här]%%github%%.
Du kan hjälpa till att översätta botten genom att följa instruktionerna i kommandot: `+translate`.

Använd `+help <kommandonamn>` för att lära dig mer om ett specifikt kommando.
De tillgängliga sidorna är listade nedan. Använd meddelandets reaktionerna för att växla mellan sidorna.
timeOut: This menu has timed out. If you wish to use it again, execute %%command%%.
staffOnly:
This command is only available to staff and thus, its information is hidden.
Please contact a staff member if you believe this is an error.
inDev: This command is currently in development and will be available at a later date!

help.description: Shows you all available commands and other info about the bot.

prefix.description: Gives you the appropriate prefix for your language(s). In order to get a custom prefix, execute `+prefix <flags>` and replace `<flags>` with the regional code of your country's flag or its name. You can add as many flags as you wish, separated by a space.

quote.description: Genererar ett roligt/konstigt/klokt citat från servern.

mention.description: Mentions a language role with an optional message.

context.description: Visar, lägger till eller redigerar ett string-ID. `+context help` för mer information om detta kommando.

languagestats.description: Shows you the progress of a language on all the projects we currently support.

issue.description: Opens our GitHub issues page, where you can report problems and send feedback.

language.description: Ändrar språk, visar ditt aktuella språk eller en lista över tillgängliga språk. Om du vill begära ett nytt språk, kör "+ språk lägg till <språk>".

hypixelstats.description: Shows you basic Hypixel stats for the provided user.

hypixelverify.description: Links your Discord account with your Hypixel profile. Execute `+hypixelunverify` to unverify yourself.

8ball.description: The Magic 8 Ball that will answer all your questions.

verify.description: Automatically checks for changes on your Crowdin profile and gives you the appropriate roles. If your profile is not stored on our database, you can provide it as an argument in the command. To check if your profile is stored, execute `+profile`. Make sure you have DMs enabled from this server so that the bot can send you a message.

profile.description: Gives you the link to your Crowdin profile if it's stored on our database. If it's not, you can execute `+help reverify` to learn how to store your profile and update your roles.

rank.description: Gives you the current XP for yourself or any given user.

tip.description: Gives you a random tip regarding the server.

invite.description: Gives you an invite link to the server. Please use this whenever you want to invite someone.

projects.description: Gives you links and information about all the translation projects we support on the server.

hypixel.description: Ger dig användbar information om Hypixel-projektet.

guidelines.description: Gives you the link to the official thread regarding Hypixel translations.

quickplay.description: Ger dig användbar information om Quickplay-projektet.

skyblockaddons.description: Ger dig användbar information om SkyblockAddons-projektet.

translate.description: Ger dig användbar information om hur du översätter botten.

thread.description: Gives you the link to the thread announcing this Discord server.

twitter.description: Gives you the link to the official Hypixel Translators Community Twitter page.
